title: Science Information Literacy Enhancement Program in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and understanding of fundamental science concepts
context.additional_context: Program to improve information search/analysis skills for adult learners in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, designed for working professionals with weekend/evening learning feasibility

learning_goals: Learners can identify and utilize at least three reliable scientific information sources in mobile environments.
Learners can apply online information evaluation criteria (e.g., CRAAP Test) to determine the credibility of scientific information with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can effectively select information aligned with research objectives by comparing academic databases and open-access materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
